tutorials.title: Adding a Pie Chart
tutorials.description: This tutorial shows you how to create a pie chart in a new page in an application.

tutorials.title: Adding a Bar Chart
tutorials.description: This 15-minute tutorial shows you how to edit a chart.

tutorials.title: Changing Chart Appearance with JavaScript
tutorials.description: This 5-minute tutorial shows you how to create a custom JavaScript to change the appearance of a chart.
